ai-patthana16.55:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.55:0.3_0: for those looking forward to enjoying the forms,
ai-patthana16.55:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, form doesn’t give rise to the form, for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana16.55:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana16.55:2.1_0: Not seeing the cause of impingement, form doesn’t give rise to form in the formless.
ai-patthana16.55:2.1_1: Not seeing the cause of impingement, form doesn’t give rise to unshakable things. ...
ai-patthana16.55:2.1_2: Such things don’t give rise to the formless, or in the formless.
